org.framed.orm.ui.command.connectionkinds

Class CallRelationshipConstraintsActionCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.gef.commands.Command
      • org.framed.orm.ui.command.connectionkinds.CallRelationshipConstraintsActionCommand

  • public class CallRelationshipConstraintsActionCommand
extends org.eclipse.gef.commands.Command
    Through this command the RelationshipConstraintsAction is called. This command is called, when the user selects the figure of a Relation from type total, cyclic or irreflexive and the clicks on the delete button.(red X in the actionbar)
    Author:
    Kay Bierzynski

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CallRelationshipConstraintsActionCommand()
      Constructor of this command, where the label is set, which describes this command to the user.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canExecute()
      This method tests if the conditions for executing this command are fulfilled,
      void execute()
      In this method we get the ORMGraphicalEditor, which owns the RelationshipConstraintsAction.
      void redo()
      This command is redone through calling RelationshipConstraintsAction.actionRedo().
      void setEditPart(org.eclipse.gef.EditPart editPart)
      Setter of the EditPart, which the user has selected for deletion.
      void undo()
      This command is undone through calling RelationshipConstraintsAction.actionUndo().

      • canExecute

        public boolean canExecute()
        This method tests if the conditions for executing this command are fulfilled,
        Overrides:
        canExecute in class org.eclipse.gef.commands.Command
        Returns:
        true if the parameter editPart is set.

      • execute

        public void execute()
        In this method we get the ORMGraphicalEditor, which owns the RelationshipConstraintsAction. After we got the editor we derive from it the RelationshipConstraintsAction, set the action up and run the action through calling the run method.
        Overrides:
        execute in class org.eclipse.gef.commands.Command

      • undo

        public void undo()
        This command is undone through calling RelationshipConstraintsAction.actionUndo(). The action must undo itself, because a command has in the normal case no accesses to the CommandStack.
        Overrides:
        undo in class org.eclipse.gef.commands.Command

      • redo

        public void redo()
        This command is redone through calling RelationshipConstraintsAction.actionRedo(). The action must redo itself, because a command has in the normal case no accesses to the CommandStack.
        Overrides:
        redo in class org.eclipse.gef.commands.Command

        Setter of the EditPart, which the user has selected for deletion.
